Name: Apex Technology Acquisition Corporation
Description: Apex Technology Acquisition Corporation (APXTU) is a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) dedicated to identifying and merging with innovative technology enterprises both domestically and internationally. With an emphasis on high-growth sectors, Apex leverages the extensive industry expertise of its management team to create sustainable long-term value. By facilitating efficient access to the public markets, APXTU is strategically positioned to seize transformative opportunities amidst the dynamic and fast-paced technology landscape, aiming to deliver significant returns for its investors.
Address: 533 AIRPORT BOULEVARD, BURLINGAME, CA, UNITED STATES, 94010
